long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adzesto presents Moto - A Minimal New Tab Google extension.

It's easy to give your Chrome New Tab window a new look with Moto. By installing this extension, you can replace your current New Tab window with a sleek interface feature.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept the installation of the Moto extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing, as described in the Terms of Use(https://www.adzesto.com/terms-and-conditions/) and Privacy Policy(https://www.adzesto.com/privacy-policy/).
